name: The GO Global Brand
tag_list: startup, geeks, investors, venture-capital, funding, london, manchester, liverpool, paris, reading, oxford, cambridge, belfast, los-angeles, silicon-valley, san-francisco, boston, san-diego, ron-conway, paul-graham, jessica-livingston, tech-city, media-ci
overview:
The GO Global Brand focuses their business effort on building companies overseas and has the network and expertise to expand fast growth companies in the US, throughout Europe and Asia. Clients have included Yahoo!, Google, Service Source, Graphic.ly.

The GO Global Brand offers three distinct business growth packages;

GO Global Consulting: We provide a full service of support to companies making that first investment into an overseas market. We take out the risk of failure and support the company through back office management, recruitment, real estate assessment and business sales without the high capital cost a company would pay up front for setting up themselves. We stop you from making financial mistakes on overseas tax, vat, legal and contract issues.

GO Global Marketing: We offer a full solution to your market access through intelligent due diligence reports, customer acquisition support, referral and lead generation support. We create market access strategies and plan events, PR and offer a full range of merchandising solutions. We specialize on Global Venture Investment Summits and were there pimary supporter for LA’s first New Media & Entertainment Venture Summit with The Duke & Duchess of Cambridge. We provider Founders from Facebook, Blinkx, Google, and many more Entrepreneurial companies.

Geeks GO Global: is a global network of startup companies, venture capital investors and innovative entrepreneurs all coming up with the cash, the innovations and the next big idea within a supporting mentoring network. Members of Geeks GO Global get access to some of the most successful serial entrepreneurs and active investors from angel rounds to IPOâ€™s. We host regular overseas missions to support new media, entertainment and technology based companies who are looking to access overseas markets with entrepreneurial growth speed, low startup costs, strategic partnerships and increased valuations. Get to Silicon Valley, Tech City UK, Los Angeles to springboard your company to success, contact gareth@geeksgoglobal.com (join our next launch pad trip to the UK in November 2011). About Geeks GO Global www.geeksgoglobal.com
